title: Chapter 4D - Traffic Control Signal Features
content:
Chapter 4D - Traffic Control Signal Features

State Regulations
§ 4D.05 - Application of Steady Signal Indications
§ 4D.12 - Visibility, Aiming, and Shielding of Signal Faces
§ 4D.13 - Lateral Positioning of Signal Faces
§ 4D.14 - Longitudinal Positioning of Signal Faces
§ 4D.15 - Mounting Height of Signal Faces
§ 4D.29 - Flashing Operation - Transition Into Flashing Mode
§ 4D.31 - Flashing Operation - Transition Out of Flashing Mode

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
